<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get identity flags and traits"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/identities"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve the flags and traits for an identity. Note: identity will be lazily created if it does not already exist.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"identifier","in":"query","description":"Identity Key","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","description":"The string referencing the Identity"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"items":{"type":"object","properties":{"flags":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"enabled":{"type":"boolean"},"feature_state_value":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string","example":"a-remote-config-value"},{"type":"number","example":42},{"type":"boolean","example":true}],"nullable":true},"feature":{"title":"feature","type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","readOnly":true,"example":42},"name":{"type":"string","example":"show_hero_banner"},"type":{"type":"string","example":"STANDARD"}}}},"title":"FeatureState"}},"traits":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"trait_key":{"type":"string","example":"Name"},"trait_value":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string","example":"B.A. Baracus"},{"type":"number","example":42},{"type":"boolean","example":true}],"nullable":true}},"title":"Trait"}}},"title":"IdentitiesResponse"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
